data.title: Smith College | Campus Energy Decarbonization Study
data.meta_description: Introba (formerly Integral Group) developed and evaluated available options and recommended a clear strategy and comprehensive technical concept to enable Smith College to achieve its 2030 Climate Targets. The study carefully considered various technical, economic, environmental, and logistical factors, opportunities, and limitations in the specific context of Smith College’s existing energy infrastructure and its ultimate goals. The recommended strategy comprised the following short, medium, and long-term progression steps:
data.text:
Introba (formerly Integral Group) developed and evaluated available options and recommended a clear strategy and comprehensive technical concept to enable Smith College to achieve its 2030 Climate Targets.

The study carefully considered various technical, economic, environmental, and logistical factors, opportunities, and limitations in the specific context of Smith College’s existing energy infrastructure and its ultimate goals.

The recommended strategy comprised the following short, medium, and long-term progression steps:
